content.title: Application complete
content.paymentSuccessful: Payment has been taken. Your payment reference and receipt have been emailed to you.
content.emailConfirmation: Email confirmation has been sent to
content.whatToDoNowReferenceNumber: 1. Write your reference number on each document
content.whatToDoNowRefNumText: You need to write the 16-digit number on the back of each of the following documents:
content.whatToDoNowOrigCert: your original marriage certificate or a certified copy (don’t use a photocopy)
content.whatToDoNowNameChange: proof of your name change, for example a deed poll. Include proof of each change if you’ve done it more than once since you got married
content.whatToDoNowCertTrans: an English translation of your marriage certificate
content.whatToDoNowRefNumPrtScr: If you can’t write the reference number on each document, you can print this screen and include it with your documents.
content.certificateKept: Your certificate will be kept by the court and won’t be returned to you.
content.whatToDoNowOrigCertOnly: You need to write the 16-digit number on the back of your marriage certificate. This must be the original or a certified copy. Don’t use a photocopy.
content.email: You can also email your documents to the court. Include your reference number in the subject line of the email.
content.courtWillCheck: Your application will be checked. If it’s correct, you’ll be sent a notice telling you that your application has been issued (sent out). You’ll also get a case number and a copy of the application stamped by the divorce centre.
content.youCanFindMore: Your {{divorceWho}} will also receive a copy of the application and a form to return. If you have used adultery as your reason for divorce, and named the person that your {{divorceWho}} committed adultery with, they will also get a copy and a form to return.
content.contactTheCourt: Contact the divorce centre if you don’t hear anything back after 3 weeks.
content.getHelpDescription: You can contact the divorce centre if you need help with your application. Court staff can’t give you legal advice however, and you should speak to a solicitor or legal adviser if you need help with that.
content.courtCheckApp: How much financial help you get with your fee depends on your individual circumstances. Court staff will check if your help with fees application has been successful, and if you still need to pay anything.
content.youWillBeContacted: You’ll be contacted if you need to pay anything.
content.startFinancialProceedings1: To formally start financial proceedings, you’ll also need to complete another form (known as Form A) and pay another fee of £{{financialOrderApplicationFee}}. Read the guidance on financial orders.
content.startFinancialProceedings2: The court won’t start processing your request for a financial order until you submit Form A and pay the fee.
content.consentOrder: If you agree with your {{divorceWho}} on how your money and property will be split, and want it to be legally binding, you can apply for a consent order.
content.settle: If in the future you want the court to settle your financial arrangements with your {{divorceWho}}, you can only apply for a financial order until you remarry. Once you’ve married someone else, you will lose the right to do so.
content.improveServiceContent: This is a new service which is still being developed. If you haven’t already, please provide feedback on what you think of it and how it can be improved.
content.howRespondsLink: How your {{ case.divorceWho }} responds
content.decreeNisiLink: Decree nisi
content.decreeAbsoluteLink: Decree absolute
content.childrenAndDivorceLink: Children and divorce
content.moneyAndPropertyLink: Money and property
content.amendedCourtCheck: The court will check your amended application and may contact you again if they need further information.
content.amendedAmendedApplication: If your amended application passes these checks, you’ll be sent a notice telling you that it has been issued (sent out). Your {{ divorceWho }} will then receive a copy of the amended application and a form to return.
content.amendedUsedAdultery: If you have used adultery as your reason for divorce, and named the person that your {{ divorceWho }} committed adultery with, they will also get a copy and a form to return.
content.amendedContactUs: You can contact us if you don’t hear anything back after 4 weeks.
content.amendedPostDocsSubmitDocuments: Your response said you want to submit additional documents.
content.amendedPostDocsOriginalDocs: Post all your original documents to:
content.amendedPostDocsReferenceNumber: You must write your reference number on each document.
content.amendedPostDocsCheckResponse: The court will check your response

content.title: Cais wedi’i gwblhau
content.paymentSuccessful: Cymerwyd y taliad. Mae’r cyfeirnod talu a’r dderbynneb wedi eu hanfon atoch drwy e-bost.
content.emailConfirmation: Mae neges e-bost yn cadarnhau ein bod wedi cael eich cais wedi’i anfon i
content.whatToDoNowReferenceNumber: 1. Ysgrifennwch eich cyfeirnod ar bob dogfen
content.whatToDoNowRefNumText: Mae angen ichi ysgrifennu’r rhif 16-digid ar gefn pob un o’r dogfennau canlynol:
content.whatToDoNowOrigCert: eich tystysgrif briodas wreiddiol neu gopi ardystiedig ohoni (peidiwch â defnyddio llungopi)
content.whatToDoNowNameChange: prawf eich bod wedi newid eich enw, er enghraifft gweithred newid enw. Dylid cynnwys prawf o bob newid enw os ydych wedi newid eich enw fwy nag unwaith ers ichi briodi
content.whatToDoNowRefNumPrtScr: Os na allwch ysgrifennu’r cyfeirnod ar bob dogfen, gallwch argraffu cynnwys y sgrin hon a’i atodi gyda’ch dogfennau.
content.whatToDoNowPostText: Postiwch eich dogfennau i gyd i:
content.certificateKept: Bydd y llys yn cadw eich tystysgrif ac ni fyddwn yn ei dychwelyd.
content.whatToDoNowOrigCertOnly: Mae angen ichi ysgrifennu’r rhif 16-digid ar gefn eich tystysgrif briodas. Mae’n rhaid i hon fod yn ddogfen wreiddiol neu’n gopi ardystiedig. Peidiwch â defnyddio llungopi.
content.email: Gallwch e-bostio eich dogfennau i’r llys. Dylid rhoi eich cyfeirnod yn llinell deitl yr e-bost.
content.courtWillCheck: Byddwn yn gwirio eich cais. Os yw’n gywir, byddwn yn anfon hysbysiad atoch i roi gwybod ichi fod eich cais wedi ei gyhoeddi (ei anfon). Byddwch yn cael rhif achos a chopi o’r cais wedi ei stampio gan y ganolfan ysgaru.
content.youCanFindMore: Bydd eich {{divorceWho}} hefyd yn cael copi o’r cais a ffurflen i’w dychwelyd. Os mai godineb yw eich rheswm dros ysgaru, a’ch bod wedi enwi’r unigolyn y godinebodd eich {{divorceWho}} ag ef/hi, bydd ef/hi hefyd yn cael copi a ffurflen i’w dychwelyd.
content.contactTheCourt: Cysylltwch â’r ganolfan ysgaru os na fyddwch wedi clywed gennym ar ôl 3 wythnos.
content.getHelpDescription: Gallwch gysylltu â ni os ydych eisiau cymorth gyda’ch cais am ysgariad. Fodd bynnag, ni all staff y llys roi cyngor cyfreithiol ichi, a dylech siarad â chyfreithiwr neu gynghorydd cyfreithiol os ydych angen cymorth efo hyn.
content.courtCheckApp: Mae’r cymorth ariannol a fydd ar gael ichi yn dibynnu ar eich amgylchiadau unigol. Bydd staff y llys yn gwirio i weld a fu eich cais am gymorth i dalu ffioedd yn llwyddiannus, ac a oes angen ichi dalu unrhyw beth.
content.youWillBeContacted: Byddwn yn cysylltu â chi os bydd gofyn ichi dalu unrhyw beth.
content.startFinancialProceedings1: I gychwyn achosion ariannol yn ffurfiol, bydd angen i chi lenwi ffurflen arall (a elwir yn Ffurflen A) a thalu ffi o Â£{{financialOrderApplicationFee}}. Darllenwch y canllaw ar orchmynion ariannol.
content.startFinancialProceedings2: Ni fydd y llys yn dechrau prosesu eich cais am orchymyn ariannol nes byddwch yn cyflwyno Ffurflen A ac yn talu’r ffi.
content.consentOrder: Os ydych yn cytuno â’ch {{divorceWho}} ynglyn â sut y byddir yn rhannu eich arian a’ch eiddo, a’ch bod am i hynny fod yn gyfreithiol-rwymol, gallwch wneud cais am orchymyn cydsynio.
content.settle: Yn y dyfodol, os ydych am i’r llys setlo eich trefniadau ariannol gyda’ch {{divorceWho}}, ni allwch wneud cais am orchymyn ariannol ar ôl ichi ailbriodi. Unwaith y byddwch wedi priodi rhywun arall, byddwch yn colli’r hawl i wneud hynny.
content.helpImproveService: Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn
content.improveServiceContent: Mae hwn yn wasanaeth newydd sy’n dal i gael ei ddatblygu. Os nad ydych eisoes wedi gwneud hynny, rhowch sylwadauprovide feedback ar y gwasanaeth a sut y gellir ei wella.
